submission:
class Solution(object):
    def countSubarrays(self, nums, k):
        """
        :type nums: List[int]
        :type k: int
        :rtype: int
        """
        n = len(nums)
        sk = [[0]*2 for _ in range(n)]
        st=0
        r  =0
        for i in range(n):
            v = nums[i]
            for j in range(st):
                sk[j][0]&=v
            sk[st][0]=v
            sk[st][1]=i
            st+=1
            m=0
            for j in range(st):
                if j and sk[j][0]==sk[j-1][0]: continue
                sk[m][0]=sk[j][0]
                sk[m][1]=sk[j][1]
                m+=1
            st = m
            # print sk[:st]
            for j in range(st):
                if sk[j][0]==k:
                    if j+1<st:
                        ni = sk[j+1][1]
                    else:
                        ni = i+1
                    r+=ni-sk[j][1]
                    break
        return r
